name: String
Greedy
action: Search a search token within 3 spaces of you.

name: String
Throwing Knives
action: Attack. When Attacking an adjacent monster, gain +1 damage.;Effect:AdjacentFoeDamage:1

name: String
Lucky Charm
passive: Exhaust this card to reroll an attribute test. You must keep the new results.;Effect:Reroll:AttributeTest

name: String
Appraisal
passive: After you draw a Search card, you may discard it to draw a new Search card. You must keep the second card.

name: String
Dirty Tricks
action: Action: Perform an attack with a Melee or Blade weapon. If the attack deals at least 1 Heart (after rolling a defense dice), the target is Stunned.

name: String
Sneaky
passive:
You gain +1 Heart on attacks against monsters that did not have a line of sight of you at the start of your turn (even if this card is exhausted).
You may exhaust this card to perform an open or close a door action without using an action.

name: String
Caltrops
passive: When a monster moves into an empty space adjacent to you, exhaust this card to test Awareness. If you pass, the monster suffers 1 Heart and is Immobilized.

name: String
Tumble
passive: Exhaust this card during your turn. While this card is exhausted, you may move through enemy figures.

name: String
Unseen
passive: Exhaust this card during your turn. While this card is exhausted, each attack that targets you misses unless the attacker spends 1 Surge.

name: String
Lurk
passive: Exhaust this card during your turn to perform a search action; this does not require an action. While this card is exhausted, add 1 addtional brown die to your defense pool.

name: String
Bushwhack
action: Exhaust this card during your turn to attack a monster that is the only monster in your line of sight. This attack does not require an action.
